AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks whether auditing is running or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry eixsts or not in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqgated
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for gated: Checks whether the system is configured to be a router or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for IPSec: Checks whether IPSec is enabled or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for loginherald: Checks the herald value is set or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnosyn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for NoSyn: Checks whether IPSec is enabled or not, if its not, then enable it

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqrl
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for root login: Checks whether any non root user exists who has login privileges

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqrrl
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for remote root login: Checks whether any non root user exists with privileges to login remotely

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqtcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for TCB: Checks whether TCB is enabled or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqsed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for SED: Checks whether the machine has 64 bit kernel support or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnontcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for non-TCB: Checks whether the system is non TCB or not

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqRSSSFull
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for RealSecure Server Sensor Full: This option is for the full version and has to be purchased. Please visit www.iss.net to get more details.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqRSSSLite
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for RealSecure Server Sensor Lite: To use this option, please install ServerSensor.pkg from the AIX Expansion Pack.

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum age for password: Specifies the minimum number of weeks to 1 week, before a password can be changed

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum age for password: Specifies the minimum number of weeks to 4 weeks, before a password can be changed

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum age for password: Removes any minimum number of weeks requirements before a password can be changed

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum age for password: Specifies the maximum number of weeks (13 weeks) that a password is valid

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum age for password: Specifies the maximum number of weeks (13 weeks) that a password is valid

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum age for password: Specifies the maximum number of weeks (13 weeks) that a password is valid

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum age for password: Removes any minimum number of weeks requirements, that a password is valid

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Time to change password after the expiration: Specifies the maximum number of weeks to 2 weeks, after maxage that an expired password can be changed by the user

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Time to change password after the expiration: Specifies the maximum number of weeks to 4 weeeks, after maxage that an expired password can be changed by the user

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Time to change password after the expiration: Specifies the maximum number of weeks to 8 weeeks, after maxage that an expired password can be changed by the user

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Time to change password after the expiration: Removes any minimum number of weeks requirements, after maxage that an expired password can be changed by the user

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum length for password: Specifies the minimum length of a password to 8

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum length for password: Specifies the minimum length of a password to 8

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum length for password: Specifies the minimum length of a password to 8

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum length for password: Removes the minimum length constraint on password

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to 2

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to 2

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to 2

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of alphabetic chars: Removes the minimum number of alphabetic characters constraint, in a password

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of non-alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 2

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of non-alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 2

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of non-alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 2

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of non-alphabetic chars: Removes the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters constraint, in a password

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum times a char can appear in a password: Specifies the maximum number of times a character can appear in a password to 2

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum times a char can appear in a password: Specifies the maximum number of times a character can appear in a password to 8

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of chars: Specifies the minimum number of characters required in a new password to 4, that were not in the old password

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of chars: Specifies the minimum number of characters required in a new password to 4, that were not in the old password

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of chars: Specifies the minimum number of characters required in a new password to 4, that were not in the old password

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of chars: Removes the constraint on the minimum number of characters required in a new password that were not in the old password

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reset time: Specifies the number of weeks to 13 weeks, before a password can be reused

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reset time: Specifies the number of weeks to 13 weeks, before a password can be reused

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reset time: Specifies the number of weeks to 26 weeks, before a password can be reused

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reset time: Removes any minimum number of weeks requirements before a password can be reused

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reuse time: Specifies the number of previous passwords a user cannot resuse to 20

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reuse time: Specifies the number of previous passwords a user cannot resuse to 4

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reuse time: Specifies the number of previous passwords a user cannot resuse to 4

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reuse time: Removes the constraint on the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_pwdwarntime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password expiration warning time: Specifies the number of days to 5 days, before the system issues a warning that a password change is required

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_pwdwarntime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password expiration warning time: Specifies the number of days to 5 days, before the system issues a warning that a password change is required

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_pwdwarntime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password expiration warning time: Specifies the number of days to 5 days, before the system issues a warning that a password change is required

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_pwdwarntime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password expiration warning time: Removes the constraint on the number of days before the system issues a warning that a password change is required

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Number of login attempts before locking the account: Specifies the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts to 3, for each non-root user account before the account is disabled

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Number of login attempts before locking the account: Specifies the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts to 4, for each non-root user account before the account is disabled

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Number of login attempts before locking the account: Specifies the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts to 5, for each non-root user account before the account is disabled

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Number of login attempts before locking the account: Removes the constraint on the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts per non-root user account before the account is disabled

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Delay between unsuccessful logins: Specifies the delay between unsuccessful logins to 10 seconds

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Delay between unsuccessful logins: Specifies the delay between unsuccessful logins to 5 seconds

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Delay between unsuccessful logins: Specifies the delay between unsuccessful logins to 5 seconds

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Delay between unsuccessful logins: Removes any login delays between two unsuccessful login attempts

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_logindisable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable login after unsuccessful login attempts: Specifies the number of unsuccessful login attempts on a port to 10, before the port is locked

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_logindisable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable login after unsuccessful login attempts: Specifies the number of unsuccessful login attempts on a port to 10, before the port is locked

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_logindisable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove the unsuccessful login constraint: Removes the constraint on the number of unsuccessful login attempts on a port, before the port can be locked

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_logininterval
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Interval between unsuccessful logins: Specifies the time interval(300 seconds) for a port in which the unsuccessful login attempts must occur before the port is disabled

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_logininterval
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Interval between unsuccessful logins: Specifies the time interval(60 seconds) for a port in which the unsuccessful login attempts must occur before the port is disable

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_logininterval
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Interval between unsuccessful logins: Removes any time interval for a port in which the unsuccessful login attempts must occur before the port is disabled

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_loginreenable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Reenable login after locking: Specifies the time interval(360 minutes) after which a port is unlocked after being disabled by logindisable

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_loginreenable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Reenable login after locking: Specifies the time interval(30 minutes) after which a port is unlocked after being disabled by logindisable

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_loginreenable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Reenable login after locking: Removes any time interval after which a port is unlocked after being disabled by logindisable

AIXPertEntry.name: hls_logintimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login timeout: Specifies the time interval(30 seconds) to type in a password

AIXPertEntry.name: mls_logintimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login timeout: Specifies the time interval(60 seconds) to type in a password

AIXPertEntry.name: lls_logintimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login timeout: Specifies the time interval(60 seconds) to type in a password

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_logintimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login timeout: Specifies the time interval(60 seconds) to type in a password

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rootrlogin
